com.yantra.api.ycd

Interface registerBarcodeForCustomerPick

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.YCDApi, YIFApi

    public interface registerBarcodeForCustomerPick

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document registerBarcodeForCustomerPick(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      registerBarcodeForCustomerPick API combines the functions of translateBarcode and changeShipment APIs.

    • Method Detail

      • registerBarcodeForCustomerPick

        org.w3c.dom.Document registerBarcodeForCustomerPick(YFSEnvironment env,
                                                    org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                    java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                    com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException

        registerBarcodeForCustomerPick API combines the functions of translateBarcode and changeShipment APIs. This API is primarily used for recording customer pick . This API is used to update customer picked quantity for a Shipment Line by passing a barcode that translates to an Item. Passed barcode will be translated to Item details by calling translateBarcode API. If translateBarcode API does not give any result, getItemList API is called with the barcode data as ItemID to get the Item Details. A matching pickable Shipment Line is found with this Item details. customer picked quantity of this Shipment Line will be incremented by calling changeShipment API.


        If the barcode passed contains Quantity, then the customer picked quantity of the matching Shipment Line will be incremented by it. Else by default the customer picked quantity will be incremented by one unit.

        The Shipment Line that is updated will be returned in the output - under ShipmentContextualInfo element.

        Also refer to translateBarcode API javadocs for more details.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD
        *

        Validations:


          If Shipment does not exist for the passed data in ShipmentContextualInfo element. Error Code : YDM00289.

          If the Barcode data passed does not translate into any business data. Error Code : YCD00063.

          If the Barcode data passed translates into multiple data i.e unique Item information could not be retrieved. Error Code : YCD00064.

          If the Barcode data passed is not Item related source. Error Code : YCD00065.

          If the Item retrieved with the Barcode data passed, does not belong to the Shipment being picked. Error Code : YCD00066.

          If the Customer Picked Quantity exceeds Shipment Line Quantity. Error Code : YCD00079.

        User Exits: None

        Events Raised: None

        Audits: None

        Pre Conditions: None

        Post Conditions: None

        Output Template Support: Only for Shipment Details.

        Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        A XML document that contains shipmenet details ready for customer pickup.For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Yantra exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
